title: Image Combiner
alert_columns_must_be_positive: Columns must be a positive number.
alert_offset_cannot_be_empty_or_negative: Offset (px) cannot be empty or negative.
alert_cropping_params_cannot_be_empty: Cropping parameters (X, Y, Width, Height) cannot be empty.
alert_cropping_width_height_must_be_posi: Cropping Width and Height must be positive values.
alert_cropping_xy_cannot_be_negative: Cropping X and Y coordinates cannot be negative.
alert_masking_params_cannot_be_empty: Masking parameters (X, Y, Width, Height) cannot be empty when enabled.
alert_masking_width_height_must_be_posit: Masking Width and Height must be positive values when enabled.
alert_masking_xy_cannot_be_negative: Masking X and Y coordinates cannot be negative when enabled.
alert_failed_to_get_temp_canvas_context_: Failed to get temporary canvas context for auto-crop.
alert_failed_to_detect_crop_area: Failed to detect crop area automatically. Please set it manually.
alert_first_image_not_loaded_for_auto_ma: First image not loaded for auto mask.
alert_could_not_find_right_lv: Could not find 'Lv.' text on the right side. Disabling auto mask mode.
alert_could_not_find_left_lv: Could not find 'Lv.' text on the left side. Disabling auto self-mask mode.
alert_ocr_error: An error occurred during OCR processing. Disabling auto mask mode.
alert_image_generation_failed: Failed to generate the final image, possibly due to memory limitations. Please try again with fewer images.
